short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to go to the history of Google Chrome with just one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to go to the History page of Google Chrome browser with just one click.
Are you tired of clicking through to the Chrome browser Menu and selecting History to go to Google Chrome's History page?
This will open up the History page with just one click.
Why bother adding a separate extension for something that needs only two clicks in the Google Chrome Browser menu?
We help you save one click, which is 50% of the effort needed.
Why not just bookmark the History page?
It takes 2-3 clicks to navigate to the bookmarks menu. We dont like using the bookmark bar as well as it takes up 1 valuable line of space at the top of the Google Chrome Browser.
